warezcdn.name: Stand My Heroes: Piece of Truth
warezcdn.title: Stand My Heroes: Piece of Truth

imdb.title: Stand My Heroes: Piece of Truth
imdb.plot: Drugs have become the center of conflict in Japan and crime involving them has been increasing. The police department settled on creating a unit STAND that would include specialized experts and professionals to handle the issue.

episodes.title: PIECE 01
episodes.plot: Rei Izumi is a rookie regulatory official with the Drug Control Department, who has just been appointed as a scout to gather members for a new investigative agency called STAND that specializes in unsolved drug-related cases.

episodes.title: PIECE 2
episodes.plot: Rei tries to recruit members of Revel into STAND and is met with varying attitudes. Hatori seems rather fond of her, but the others seem to have some reservations.

episodes.title: PIECE 3
episodes.plot: The police and narcs confiscate a new drug. Rei attempts to recruit novelist Makoto Tsuzuki into STAND but receives a cold reception. Meanwhile, Makoto's younger brother and actor, Kyosuke, seems much nicer to Rei.

episodes.title: PIECE 10
episodes.plot: Rei goes to visit Sara and Kyosuke. Kyosuke trusts her enough to ask her to save his brother, and manages to convince Makoto to meet with her. Makoto then tells her his connection with Ida, and...

episodes.title: PIECE 11
episodes.plot: Rei, the DCD, and STAND all confront Kujo at the site of a supposed drug deal, but something seems off. They take him in for questioning and the more they talk to him, the more it seems that he was framed.

episodes.title: PIECE 12
episodes.plot: The one who framed Soma Kujo is revealed and Rei's life is in danger. Will Rei and STAND be able to stop the true mastermind behind all of this?
